Detailed Description

A UibUpdateThreadlet exposes a generic interface to execute parts of an application in context of another thread (i.e the GenericWorkerTask).
See also:
GenericWorkerTask

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

INT UibUpdateThreadlet::Fn (   )  [virtual]
 

Fn is the function that will be executed in thread context. Be aware of restrictions to operations that can be performed in thread context.

Implements Threadlet.
